properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 3:35AM EST until January 8 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2
to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will create areas
of blowing snow.

* WHERE...Northern Oneida county.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chill values of 5 to 15 below zero
area also expected tonight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
